Part 1
x=1, x*2=2
x=1, Sin(x)=0.841470984807897
x=2, sqrt(x)=1.4142135623731, test sqrt(x)^2=2
x=2, x^(1/5)=1.14869835499704, test x^(1/5)^5=2
x=e, e^PI=23.1406937067436, another way e^PI=23.1406937067424, should be 23.1406926
x=PI, PI^e=22.4591586202457, should be 22.459157

Part 2
fgamma(1)=0.999999989064903, test 0!=1
fgamma(2)=0.999999989064903, test 1!=1
fgamma(3)=1.99999997812981, test 2!=2
fgamma(4)=5.99999993438942, test 3!=6
fgamma(5)=23.9999997375577, test 4!=24
fgamma(6)=119.999998687788, test 5!=120
fgamma(7)=719.99999212673, test 6!=720
fgamma(8)=5039.99994488711, test 7!=5040
fgamma(9)=40319.9995590969, test 8!=40320

Part 3
lngamma(1)=-1.0935097442935E-08 
lngamma(2)=-1.09350973831468E-08 
lngamma(3)=0.693147169624848 
lngamma(4)=1.79175945829296 
lngamma(5)=3.17805381941285 
lngamma(6)=4.78749173184695 
lngamma(7)=6.579251201075 
lngamma(8)=8.52516135013032 
lngamma(9)=10.6046028918102
